name: Box Out! (itch)
description:
Started in 2012 by two former Supinfogame students, Da Picky Monkey now proudly counts 6 developers. Box Out! is our first game to be released and we are currently working on 2 other projects. We share a common philosophy and try to stick to it on each one of our endeavors: recreate the vibe and feel from the games of our 90's generation, boosted with modern gameplay elements.

E-mail: communication@dapickymonkey.com
